items.name: Broccoli
items.description: A nutritious green vegetable that is high in vitamin C and fiber.

items.name: Carrots
items.description: A root vegetable that is an excellent source of beta-carotene and vitamin K.

items.name: Apples
items.description: A sweet and crunchy fruit that is high in fiber and vitamin C.

items.name: Bananas
items.description: A popular and versatile fruit that is high in potassium and vitamin C.

items.name: Oranges
items.description: A juicy citrus fruit that is high in vitamin C and antioxidants.

items.name: Tomatoes
items.description: A versatile fruit that is high in vitamin C and lycopene, a powerful antioxidant.

items.name: Spinach
items.description: A leafy green vegetable that is high in iron, calcium, and vitamin K.

items.name: Strawberries
items.description: A sweet and juicy fruit that is high in vitamin C and antioxidants.

items.name: Grapes
items.description: A delicious fruit that is high in antioxidants and beneficial plant compounds.

items.name: Cucumbers
items.description: A refreshing vegetable that is low in calories and high in vitamin K and potassium.
